name: MvPolynomial.ACounit_X
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
B : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring A
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring B
inst✝ : Algebra A B
b : B
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.ACounit A B) (MvPolynomial.X b)) b
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ACounit_X (b : B) : ACounit A B (X b) = b :=
  aeval_X _ b

name: MvPolynomial.ACounit_C
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
B : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring A
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring B
inst✝ : Algebra A B
a : A
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.ACounit A B) (MvPolynomial.C a)) ((algebraMap A B) a)
decl:
theorem ACounit_C (a : A) : ACounit A B (C a) = algebraMap A B a :=
  aeval_C _ a

name: MvPolynomial.ACounit_surjective
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
B : Type u_2
inst✝² : CommSemiring A
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring B
inst✝ : Algebra A B
⊢ Function.Surjective ⇑(MvPolynomial.ACounit A B)
decl: theorem ACounit_surjective : Surjective (ACounit A B) := fun b => ⟨X b, ACounit_X A b⟩

name: MvPolynomial.counit_surjective
initialProofState:
R : Type u_3
inst✝ : CommRing R
⊢ Function.Surjective ⇑(MvPolynomial.counit R)
decl:
theorem counit_surjective : Surjective (counit R) :=
  ACounit_surjective ℤ R

name: MvPolynomial.counitNat_surjective
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring A
⊢ Function.Surjective ⇑(MvPolynomial.counitNat A)
decl:
theorem counitNat_surjective : Surjective (counitNat A) :=
  ACounit_surjective ℕ A

name: MvPolynomial.counit_C
initialProofState:
R : Type u_3
inst✝ : CommRing R
n : Int
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.counit R) (MvPolynomial.C n)) ↑n
decl:
theorem counit_C (n : ℤ) : counit R (C n) = n :=
  ACounit_C _ _

name: MvPolynomial.counitNat_C
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring A
n : Nat
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.counitNat A) (MvPolynomial.C n)) ↑n
decl:
theorem counitNat_C (n : ℕ) : counitNat A (C n) = n :=
  ACounit_C _ _

name: MvPolynomial.counit_X
initialProofState:
R : Type u_3
inst✝ : CommRing R
r : R
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.counit R) (MvPolynomial.X r)) r
decl:
@[simp]
theorem counit_X (r : R) : counit R (X r) = r :=
  ACounit_X _ _

name: MvPolynomial.counitNat_X
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring A
a : A
⊢ Eq ((MvPolynomial.counitNat A) (MvPolynomial.X a)) a
decl:
@[simp]
theorem counitNat_X (a : A) : counitNat A (X a) = a :=
  ACounit_X _ _
